posts.post_content:
Would like to get a nice lot but if not will buy smaller pieces.

I have 600 so I would like to see some T206's.

please PM or post here.  And please, I am only interested in sgc 40. 

I'd be interested in lower graded t206  in sgc slabs of  lajoie too. 


If nothing comes up I'll wait till next month and add some cash and look for a low grade Cobb 

Thanks!
